sentence.Network_en: But today, that repugnance to monotheism is not a laughing matter.
sentence.Network_cn: 然而,今天人对一神论的厌恶不再只是嘲笑那样简单了.

sentence.Network_en: We are acquiring an understanding of the history of monotheism.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们最近在了解“一神教”的历史.

sentence.Network_en: Judaism came into being in accordance with monotheism.
sentence.Network_cn: 犹太民族是因一神教而诞生的民族.
